descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Chris Duarte hauls in the dime from Tyrese Haliburton and lays it in to extend the Pacers' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Check out this sweet dime from Tyrese Haliburton) 2022/02/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tyrese Haliburton with the sweet dime to Chris Duarte for the bucket

videos.description: Chris Duarte kicks it to Buddy Hield for the 3-pointer from deep.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyrese Haliburton makes a great defensive play for the steal) 2022/02/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Buddy Hield nails the 3 from deep

videos.description: Isaiah Jackson soars through the paint to throw down the alley-oop for the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyrese Haliburton makes a sweet dime) 2022/02/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tyrese Haliburton lobs a beauty to Isaiah Jackson for the alley-oop

videos.description: Isaiah Jackson raises the roof as he elevates and throws down the lob from Chris Duarte.
videos.headline: Chris Duarte with a beautiful dime to Isaiah Jackson for the left-handed slam

videos.description: Cedi Osman steals the rock and takes it coast-to-coast for the and-1.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cedi Osman gets the hoop and the harm) 2022/02/12 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cedi Osman gets it done on both sides of the court
